title: Decoy Hide Text & Call Logs L
creator: Manas Gajare

extendedInfo.description: *HIDE TEXT Messages / SMS and CALL LOGS from the prying eyes of Parents, Siblings, Spouse, Friends.*Use Decoy Hide Text and call logs. Get back your privacy. *Make susre your private messages remain private. Hide messages and call logs from the world. *Be at peace when someone checks out your mobile. ** This is Lite version and works for 1 contact only. For unrestricted use, you can purchase PRO version. ***The app is completely functional & named as 'Ghost Detector'. Bring a magnet close to your mobile and you shall see the change in color of ghosts.To get inside the REAL app, LONG CLICK ON THE BIG WHITE GHOST.You will be prompted for password. Once you enter password you are in. And now you can avail all the features of the real app.Notifications too are disguised.It will just say Ghost detected for any new message/missed call.Features1. Powerful password protected vault2. Hide text / SMS3. Hide Call logs4. Backup text / SMS in XML & txt format5. Backup Call logs in txt format6. Disguised notifications.7. Internal SMS sending feature.8. Internal Call facility.9. Undo SMS facility. (Just in case)10. Import facility. (Even if you lose your hidden messages, you can restore them back by importing xml file.)**Some thing is truly secret if no one even knows that such a thing exists!**Exactly like this saying, with our app, no one will have even the slightest doubt that you are using a privacy app. This is how we intend to maintain privacy of our users.Any doubts or issues?? Do mail us. We reply promptly. Please don't put issues in comments section. We cannot respond.
